resources.string:
App Purpose: 
In HK, finding parking space is often difficult. This map helps user finding a vacant parking space nearby by taking advantage of data.gov API. 
Although not all parking space is modernized, the API possess real-time status of over 18,000 parking space, providing good reference for drivers.

This app makes use of external resources including chaquopy, openstreetmap. 

This app is developed by Rex Li for the purpose of course project for HKU COMP7506.

How to use: 
Navigate the streets as the app receive GPS location and search for vacant parking space nearby. User can click on the list for exact location of the vacant parking space. For drivers, long-press on the list will direct to GoogleMap Direction, allowing real-time driving navigation to the designated parking space.

For safety of driving, do not operate the app while vehicle is mobile.

Paramater Information:
Update parking space data: every minute (~0.5MB each)
Update proximity (without new data): every 10 seconds
No. of processed parking space: 50
Date of app dev: 04-2022
